summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Laravel Blade application redesign. Successfully verified modern design implementation with soft warm colors, mobile responsiveness, and visual effects. All Blade template syntax appears correct.

design_issues.issue: Male/female node border colors showing as gray instead of expected blue/red on some nodes
design_issues.note: May be related to deceased node styling override

passed_tests: Preview.html loads correctly with modern design
Sage Green (#81B29A) and Terracotta (#E07A5F) color scheme implemented
Fraunces and Nunito fonts loaded correctly
Glassmorphism effects working on navbar and toolbar
Family tree structure displays with 9 nodes (5 male, 4 female, 3 deceased)
Spouse connectors and tree connection lines render properly
All toolbar buttons (Add, Search, Export) are clickable and responsive
Trace buttons and action buttons working correctly
Hover animations and visual effects functioning smoothly
Search input accepts text and has proper focus effects
Node hover effects and button interactions working
Blade template syntax verification completed - no syntax errors found
Responsive design adapts properly across all device sizes
Modern button styling and gradients applied correctly
